pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:blade/items/rouze_cards#change_spider)Change Spider Rouze Card$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Leangle
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Blade (2004, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:blade/devices/leangle_buckle)Leangle Buckle$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Haste II$(li)Strength II

pages.name: Jack Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:blade/items/rouze_cards#fusion_elephant)Fusion Elephant Rouze Card$(/l) while having a $(l:blade/items/rouze_absorber)Rouze Absorber$(/l) and $(l:blade/items/rouze_cards#absorb_tiger)Absorb Tiger Rouze Card$(/l) in your inventory

pages.title: Kamen Rider Leangle
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Special Edition: Clover (2008, S.I.C. Hero Saga)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:blade/devices/leangle_buckle)Leangle Buckle$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance$(li)Haste II$(li)Strength II

pages.name: King Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:blade/items/rouze_cards#evolution_tarantula)Evolution Tarantula Rouze Card$(/l) while having a $(l:blade/items/rouze_absorber)Rouze Absorber$(/l) and $(l:blade/items/rouze_cards#absorb_tiger)Absorb Tiger Rouze Card$(/l) in your inventory

pages.title: Kamen Rider Leangle
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Blade 20th Anniversary STAGE&TALK (2024, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:blade/devices/leangle_buckle)Leangle Buckle$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slowness$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Jump Boost III$(li)Strength V
